name: PAIR'S LAIR
description:
Pair's Lair is the result of mixing the classic game pairs (puzzle game) and a beat em up 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Made in 48h for the Ludum Dare 41 Compo by Alberto "_beta" Mellado.

-----------------------

Written in C# on Unity.

Tools:

Unity

Adobe Photoshop

Audacity

-----------------------

Controls:

Movement -> WASD / Arrows

Left Mouse Click -> Attack

------------------------

If you do not know what to do:

Hit enemies withe left click on top of cards to reveal them.

Make pairs of the same cards to finish the round.

Try to avoid getting hit by enemies, you will loose one of your 3 hearts if they hit you.
